251718.「誰っ！？ つまらない用事だったら\n 火あぶりに するわよ！:
Who's there!? If you're here to waste my time
with some mundane business, I'll burn you
alive!

251720.<pc>は リンベリィに\nゼクレス城に 連れていってほしいと 頼んだ！:
<pc> asked Linberry to take them
to Zechres Castle!

251721.「ハァ？ なんで アンタみたいな下等魔族を\n 城へ 連れてかなきゃならないのよ:
Huh? Why should I bring a lowborn demon like
YOU to the castle!? Get out of here!

251722.「ちょっと待って。\n アンタ……私のパーティーに 忍び込んだ\n こぎたない下:
Wait a minute. You... you're that petty
lowborn demon who snuck into my party!

251724.「私 新しい しもべを 助けたいの！: I want you to work as my new servant!

251725.「……正確には 新しい しもべ候補ね。\n アイツが 私に夢中なのは わかってる:
...Or more accurately, a new servant
candidate. I know he's crazy about me, but
there's a little snag...

251726.「ねえ。この話って\n 私たちに 何か 関係あるのかな……？:
Hey. Does this story have anything to do with
us...?

251727.「あ そっか。\n アンタ さては 知らなかったのね。: Oh, I see. You don't know, do you?

251728.「魔界大戦が起きる 少し前……\n パーティーで アンタを助けた 骨董屋。\n:
Before the war... Cyril, the antique dealer
who helped you out at the party, is none other
than...

251730.「平民に変装し 運命の恋を探していた魔王と\n 美しき大貴族の娘……。:
The Demon King, disguised as a mere commoner,
comes to the beautiful daughter of a nobleman
in search of his fated love...

251731.「アイツって 顔も声も イケてるし\n 新しい しもべに してあげてもいいかなっ:
He's got a pretty face and a nice voice, and I
was thinking I could make him my new servant,
but then the war happened...

251732.「アスバルは 愛する王太后様の死で\n 悲しみの淵に……。\n そこに つけこん:
Asbal is in the depths of grief over the death
of his mother the queen... and now someone is
taking advantage of him!

251734.「心身ともに傷を負った アスバルは\n 叔父 オジャロスに\n 国をまかせ 喪に:
Wounded in mind and body, Asbal has left the
country in the hands of his uncle, Ojalos,
while he mourns...

251735.「で 元気づけてあげようと 何度か\n 城を訪ねてるんだけど 会わせてもらえない:
I've visited the castle several times to try
and cheer him up, but they won't let me see
him. Ojalos seems to be wary of me.

251736.「……アイツは いまや 国王気取り。\n 私が アスバルを 立ち直らせたら\n:
He's acting like he's king now. I want to get
Asbal back on his feet, but that would be
inconvenient for Ojalos, so he's stopping me!

251739.<pc>は リンベリィから\nしもべの証（だいじなもの）を\n押し付けられた！<:
<pc> was forced by Linberry to take
the Servant's Proof (Key Item)!<me 60>

251740.「城の兵士の 何人かは 買収済み。\n その しもべの証を見せれば\n 下等魔族:
Some of the soldiers in the castle have been
bought off. Show them that Servant's Proof and
they'll let even a lowborn demon like you in.

251741.「城に 潜入して\n 愛しの リンベリィ様が 会いたがってると\n 魔王アスバル:
Sneak into the castle and tell Demon King
Asbal that his beloved Lady Linberry is eager
to see him!

251742.「……アンタだって パーティーで\n アスバルに助けられた恩を 返したいでしょ？:
You want to return the favor to Asbal for
saving you at the party, don't you? Then we
have to get him out of Ojalos' clutches!

251743.「なに ぼーっとしてんのよ！\n とっとと ゼクレス城に 行きなさい！:
Why are you still here!? Hurry up and get to
Zechres Castle!

251744.「……誰だい？\n 食事を 持ってきてくれたなら\n そこの机に 置いておいてく:
...Who is it? If you brought me a meal, please
leave it on the desk right there...

251745.「国のことは 叔父上に まかせている。\n 僕を そっと しておいてほしい……。:
I leave the affairs of the country to my
uncle. I want to be left in peace...

251746.「今は……誰にも 会いたくない。\n 母上の死を ひとりで悼みたいんだ……:
I don't want to see anyone right now... I just
want to mourn my mother's death alone...

251747.「げふーっ。\n いやあ この お菓子 うまいなあ！: Uurp. Oh man, these sweets are so good!

251748.「……ちょっと 様子が おかしいみたい。\n 奥へ行って 直接 アスバルに\n:
...He seems to be acting a little strange.
Let's go to the back and see Asbal directly.

251750.「私たち アスバルに 大切な話があるの。\n あなた……誰？\n どうして ここ:
We need to speak to Asbal about something
important... Who are you? Why are you here?

251751.「……オレの名は ボッガン。\n 魔王アスバル様と 声が そっくりなのを\n 見:
...The name's Boggan. I was told to sit in for
Demon King Asbal since I sound exactly like
him.

251752.「キミたち。このお菓子 あげるからさ。\n オレが 替え玉をしてたこと\n 城の:
Listen. I'll give you these snacks, just don't
tell anyone in the castle that I'm just a
stand-in...

251753.「私は いいわ。\n あなたが 食べて。: It's alright. You can have them.

251754.「えっ いらないの？\n じゃあ いっただっきまぁ～す！:
Eh, you don't want 'em? Then don't mind if I
do!

251755.「ええと……それで なんだっけ？\n ああ アスバル様に 会いたいんだったね。:
So... what did you want? Oh right, you were
here to see Lord Asbal.

251756.「アスバル様なら この国には いないよ？: But Asbal isn't in this country anymore.

251757.「オジャロス様の すすめで\n 魔界を 出たんだ……。:
He left the Demon World at the behest of Lord
Ojalos...

251758.なんと リンベリィから 押しつけられた\nしもべの証が 突然 光りだした！:
Oh, the Servant's Proof that Linberry had
forced upon you suddenly lit up!

251761.「……オジャロスめ 許せないッ！\n 私から アスバルを 引き離すために\n 魔:
...I'll never forgive that Ojalos! He drove
Asbal away from the Demon World just to keep
us apart!

251762.「あの……なんのこと？\n アスバル様は あんたのことなんて\n なんも 言って:
Um... what are you talking about? Asbal didn't
mention anything about you...

251765.「オジャロスのやつ\n アスバルを 魔界から追放して\n ゼクレス魔導国を 手に:
That bastard Ojalos banished Asbal from the
Demon World so he can take over Zechres!

251766.「まーったく あの 一族ってば 腹黒いわ！\n 亡きエルガドーラ様が 前王 イー:
That family is so black-hearted! Just like
when the late Elgadora exiled the former King
Eve!

251767.「このままじゃ アスバルも\n お父上同様 殺されちゃうかもしれないわ！\n 急:
If we don't do something, Asbal might get
killed, just like his father! We must bring
him back quickly!

251768.「そこの つぶれまんじゅう！\n アスバルは 今 どこなの！？\n さっさと 白:
Hey, pudgy face! Where is Asbal now? Tell me,
right this instant!

251769.「だ だから……アストルティアの\n ええと ヴェリナード王国って ところへ\n:
I-I told you, he's gone... to some place in
Astoltia called, umm, Verinard Kingdom, or
something...

251770.「よりによって アストルティア！？\n ヤダッ おぞましい！: Astoltia, of all places!? Ugh, how disgusting!

251771.「……アストルティアへ転移する 魔法儀式なんて\n この私でも １ヶ月以上 かか:
It would take me more than a month to prepare
a magic ritual to transfer to Astoltia. I want
to save Asbal NOW!!

251773.「……ちょっと待って！\n 今 アンタ アストルティアに行けるって\n そう言っ:
...Wait a minute! Did you just say you can go
to Astoltia!?

251774.「……しょうがないわね。\n 他に 手はないし\n アスバルのことは アンタに:
...I don't have a choice. I don't like it, but
I'll leave Asbal up to you.

251775.「アストルティアの ヴェリナード王国\n ……とかいう場所へ行って\n アスバル:
Go to Astoltia, to the Verinard Kingdom... or
whatever it was called, and bring Asbal back!

251777.「……何がなんだか わかんねえけど\n とにかく そういうことだし\n オレは:
...I have no idea what's going on, but that's
how it is. I don't wanna get involved with
this, so the rest is all on you!

251778.「あと ここで見たことは\n くれぐれも 秘密にしてくれよなっ！: Also, please keep what you saw here a secret!

251779.「……いかがですか？ アスバル先生。\n 代々の ヴェリナード王位継承者に\n:
...What do you think, Professor Asbal? What are your thoughts on the Poetry Ruins, which have been passed down to the heirs to the
throne of Verinard for generations?

251780.「まるで 夢のようだよ……！\n 歴史書に記された この すばらしい場所を\n:
It's like a dream...! I never thought I'd see
this place described in history books with my
own eyes...

251781.「やあ ひさしぶりじゃないか！ 我が親友よ！: Ah, long time no see! My good friend!

251782.「僕の故郷の 友人を\n オーディス王子は ご存知だったのですか……。\n 不思:
Prince Odis knew of my friend from my
hometown... a curious coincidence, isn't it?

251783.「なんと ふたりが 知り合いだったとは！\n アスバル先生は 高名な歴史家で\n:
I didn't know you knew each other! Professor
Asbal is an acclaimed historian, and he's my
tutor now.

251784.「そうだ！ つもる話も あるだろうから\n しばらく 授業は 中断しましょう。\:
Ah! It seems you have something on your mind
to talk about, so let's postpone the lesson
for now. I'll go take a walk around the area.

251785.「……君が アストルティアの出身であることは\n 知っていたけれど\n まさか:
...I knew you were from Astoltia, but I never
imagined you would come all the way here to
see me.

251786.「……でも どうして ここが わかったんだい？: ...But how did you know to find me here?

251787.<pc>は リンベリィから\n追放されたアスバルを 連れ戻すよう\n頼まれている:
<pc> informed Asbal that they had
been asked by Linberry to bring him home from
banishment!

251788.「……オジャロス叔父上が\n 僕を 追放しただって！？\n ばかな。あの人は 母:
...Uncle Ojalos banished me, you say? That's
ridiculous. He's nothing like my mother.

251789.「ベラストル家の お嬢さんは\n ひどい カンちがいを してるようだね。\n 叔:
I think the young lady of the Belastre house
is terribly mistaken. My uncle is the one who
saved me.

251790.「あの大戦で 心底 思い知った。\n 母が 愛したのは ゼクレスの栄華だけ。\n:
The war made me realize something. My mother
cares only for the glory of Zechres. I was
nothing more than a tool to her.

251791.「僕の悲しみを わかってくれたのは\n オジャロス叔父さんだけさ。\n あの人は:
Only Uncle Ojalos understood my sorrow. He has
always been very kind to me.

251792.「……アストルティアに来たのも\n 少し 国を離れて 気分転換したらどうだと\n:
I came to Astoltia because my uncle suggested
that I get away from the country for a while
and clear my head.

251793.「アストルティアは すばらしいところだね。\n 自由で……平和で……。\n 心か:
Astoltia is a wonderful place. The freedom...
the peace... I'm glad I came.

251794.「……もはや 魔界に 未練はない。\n 僕は アストルティアで 生きていくよ。:
I no longer have any lingering regrets about
the Demon World. I shall live in Astoltia from
now on.

251795.「悪いけど オジャロス叔父さんに\n 二度と 魔界には帰らないと 伝えてくれ……:
I'm sorry, but please tell Uncle Ojalos that
I'm never going back to the Demon World...

251796.「……おっと。僕が 魔族だということは\n くれぐれも オーディス王子には 秘密:
...Oh, and please don't tell Prince Odis that
I'm actually a demon.

251798.「ヴェリナード王家には\n 恵みの歌 導きの歌を はじめとする\n さまざまな詩:
The royal family of Verinard has a long tradition of psalms, including the Song of Grace, the Song of Guidance, and many
others...

251799.「その詩の原点は はるか 神話の時代。\n 儀式の中で 歌われた\n 古き祈りの:
The origin of the poems is said to date back
to the age of mythology. They are said to be
ancient prayers sung in ceremonies.

251800.「そういえば アスバル先生の故郷には\n どんな詩歌が 伝えられているのですか？:
Speaking of which, what kind of poetry has
been passed down in your hometown, Professor
Asbal? I'd love to know!

251801.「……それでは\n 亡き母が 愛していた 古い詩を……。:
...Then, I will read you an old poem that my
late mother once loved...

251804.「星が…消え去ろうとも 君に……: Even if the stars... fade away... for you...

251805.「……花が枯れ 星が消え去ろうとも\n 君に捧げし この心 変わらず。:
Even if the flowers wither and the stars fade
away, my heart, dedicated to you, will never
change.

251806.「どうして 知ってるんだ！？: How do you know those words!?

251808.「お願いだっ 教えてくれ！\n どこで この詩を 知ったんだ！？:
Please, tell me! Tell me where you heard this
poem!

251809.「この詩は……ゼクレスのお城で 聞いたのよ。: I heard it... in Zechres Castle.

251810.「オジャロスさんの部屋に 置いてあった\n 水槽の中の魔物が この詩だけ\n ず:
The monster in the tank in Mr. Ojalos' room
kept reciting that poem...

251811.「……オーディス王子。\n 急用ができましたので\n 今日の授業は これで終わり:
...Prince Odis. I have some urgent business to
attend to, so I must end today's class.

251812.「どうしたのです アスバル先生。\n お身体の具合でも……？:
What is it, Professor Asbal? Are you feeling
unwell...?

251813.「僕は 故郷へ帰るよ。\n どうしても 帰らなきゃいけないんだ……。: I have to go home. I really have to go back...

251814.「お願いだ。君たちも ゼクレスに来てくれ。\n オジャロス叔父上のもとで 会おう:
Please. I want you to come to Zechres. We must
meet with Uncle Ojalos.

251816.「……事情は よくわからないけど\n アスバル先生が 心配だ。:
...I don't know what's going on, but I'm
worried about Professor Asbal.

251817.「先生のことは 僕から 母上に伝えておく。\n 君は 先生の後を追ってくれ。\n:
I'll tell mother about him. You go after him.
I'm counting on you.

251818.「やーっと 魔界へ帰ってきたわね！\n ほんっと アンタってば のろまなんだから:
It's about time you came back to the Demon
World! You're a no-good sloth, you know that?

251819.「で？ 魔王アスバルは どこ？\n ちゃんと 連れ戻してきたんでしょうね。:
So? Where is the Demon King Asbal? I hope you
brought him back properly.

251820.「ここ……オジャロスさんの部屋で\n 会おうって 言ってたわ。:
Here... he said to meet him in Mr. Ojalos'
room.

251821.「よくやったわ ほめてあげる。\n それじゃ 私に ついてきなさい<heart>:
Well done, I commend you. Now then, follow
me <heart>

251822.「シリル……いいえ 魔王アスバル様。\n ベラストル家 当主 リンベリィが\n:
Cyril... I mean, Asbal. Linberry, matriarch of
House Belastre, has come to visit you.

251823.「……君たち すまないが 帰ってくれ。: ...I'm sorry, but I must ask you to leave.

251824.「どうして？\n あなたが ここに来てって 言ったのに。: Why? You told us to come here.

251825.「ハァァァ！？\n アンタたち いつの間に そんな仲に……！: Huhh!? Since when did you two become such...!

251826.「おやおや……。\n 若い お嬢さんたちに\n ずいぶん人気なんだねえ アスバル:
Well, well... you must be very popular with
the young ladies, Asbal.

251827.「ベラストル家のお嬢様と\n そちらは……おお 魔瘴の巫女どのでしたな。\n み:
The lady of House Belastre and that one...
Oh, it's the Maiden of Miasma, isn't it?
You all seem well.

251828.「彼女たちは 僕とは 関係ありません！！: They have nothing to do with me!

251830.「……さきほど ご相談した通り\n ゼクレスの王位は 叔父上に ゆずります。\n:
...As we discussed earlier, the throne of
Zechres will be left to you, uncle. Therefore,
I don't want to involve others any more...

251831.「王位を ゆずるですって！？\n どうして そんな バカなことを\n 言い出すの:
You're abdicating the throne!? Why would you
do something so idiotic!?

251832.「王家の血を引いていない オジャロスには\n 王位継承権は 存在しないはず。\n:
Ojalos, having no royal blood, should have no
claim to the throne. Why are you even still
alive!?

251833.「とにかく 決めたんだ……。\n 王位は オジャロス叔父上に ゆずり\n 僕は:
I've made my decision... I shall pass the
throne to my uncle, Ojalos, and I will live
out the rest of my days quietly in Zechres.

251834.「……行きましょう 叔父上。\n 王位交代の宣誓の日取りについて\n 臣下たちを:
...Let's go, uncle. We must gather the
subjects and discuss the date of the
abdication.

251836.「さてさて お嬢さんたち。\n 我々は これから 大切な用があるのでね。\n 今:
Well then, ladies. We have some important
business to attend to. Would you mind leaving
for today?

251837.「言われなくたって 帰るわよっ！\n 二度と こんなトコ 来るもんですか！:
I was leaving anyway, regardless of what you
say! And I'm NEVER coming back here!

251839.リンベリィは <pc>から\nしもべの証を 取り上げた！:
Linberry took the Servant's Proof from
<pc>!

251840.「魔瘴の巫女どの それでは ご機嫌よう。: Good day to you, Maiden of Miasma.

251842.アスバルは 別れ際に\n<pc>に メモを渡していった……。:
Asbal gave <pc> a note as they
parted...

251843.<center>僕の店の 大きな箱の中にある書物\n『古秘術大全 ４巻』の１１章:
I have a large box in my store where I keep a book called "Compendium of Ancient Mysteries, Volume 4". I want you to do what it says in
Chapter 11 and return to the store. ～Asbal

251844.「アスバルの店……って 城下町にある\n あの骨董品店 六大陸堂が そうなのね。:
Asbal's store...that antique store in the
castle town...The Six Continents, right?
Let's go there.

251845.「……店の中に 潜んでいる者は いない。\n 今のところ 叔父には\n 気づかれ:
...No one is lurking inside the store. So far,
my uncle doesn't seem to have noticed...

251846.「それで 無事に リドのタリスマンは\n 手に入れてきてくれたかい？: So, did you safely retrieve Lido's Talisman?

251848.「……よしっ！\n これで 母上を 助けられるぞ！: ...Yes! Now we can save my mother!

251849.「何も 事情を説明しないまま\n 協力してもらって すまなかった……。:
I'm sorry you had to help me without any
proper explanation...

251850.「城の 叔父の部屋にあった 水槽……\n あの中にいた 魔物を 覚えてるかい？:
Do you remember the tank in my uncle's room in
the castle... and the monster in it?

251851.「お城で ずっと 詩を くちずさんでいた\n あの 魔物のこと……？:
You mean that monster in the castle that's
been muttering to itself the whole time...?

251852.<center>はてなき空 はてなき時 めぐりめぐる千の星\nひとつの花 ひとつ:
Endless sky, endless time, a thousand stars
spinning around, one flower, one voice, a
thousand lives fill the earth.

251853.<center>うつろう空 過ぎゆく時\n花が枯れ 星が消え去ろうとも\n君に捧:
Even if the sky wanes, the flowers wither, and
the stars fade away, my heart, dedicated to
you, will never change.

251854.<center>ああ 愛しき人よ 信じておくれ\n我が心を燃やす この愛を……:
Oh, my darling, believe me, my heart burns
with love...

251855.「あの魔物は……\n 僕の母 王太后エルガドーラなんだ。:
That monster... is my mother, Dowager Empress
Elgadora.

251856.「でも……お母さんは 死んだはずじゃ？: But... isn't your mother supposed to be dead?

251857.「僕も 詩歌の遺跡で\n 君たちと 再会するまでは そう思っていた。:
That's what I thought too, until I met you
guys again at the Poetry Ruins.

251858.「けれど あの古い詩は\n 母が 子守唄がわりに 聞かせてくれた\n ……僕と母:
But that old poem my mother used to recite to
me as a lullaby... it's something only she and
I would know.

251859.「……急ぎ 魔界へ戻った僕が 問い詰めると\n オジャロスは うれしそうに教えて:
I hurried back to the Demon World, and when I
asked Ojalos about it, he didn't even try to
hide it.

251860.「よく あの変わり果てた姿に 気づいたねえ。\n アスバル。\n 親子の愛とは:
So, even in this form, you could tell, Asbal.
The love between a parent and their child is
truly a beautiful thing.

251861.「……そうとも。\n 瀕死の状態だった エルガドーラ姉上を\n この私が 助けて:
...Yes, that's right. I saved my sister
Elgadora, who was at death's door.

251862.「魔力が尽きて 抜けガラ同然になった\n 姉上の身体を……\n 新しい生命として:
When my sister's magic was exhausted, she was
left with nothing to work with, so I reshaped
her body into a new form.

251863.「……みじめで 下等な 魔物の姿にね。: ...in the form of a miserable, lowly monster.

251864.「もし 君のような強い魔力が あったなら\n 姉上を 元の姿に 戻せたかもしれな:
If I had your kind of strong magical power, I might have been able to restore my sister to her original form, but unfortunately, I was
born with a poor constitution.

251865.「私の魔力では 変わり果てた姉上を\n 生かしておくだけで 精一杯。:
With my magical power, it was all I could do
just to keep her alive in that form.

251866.「ああ……残念だねえ。\n 君が 部屋に閉じこもっていなければ\n 姉上の再構成:
Ah... what a pity. If you hadn't been locked
away in your room, you could have helped me
put my sister back together.

251867.「だが……考えてごらん。アスバル。\n 君にとっては これで よかったのさ。:
But... think about it this way, Asbal. This is
all the best for you.

251868.「今の姉上は 獣も同然。まともな知能のない\n 食べて 眠るだけの生き物だ。:
Right now, my sister is no better than a
beast. A creature that only eats and sleeps,
with no proper intelligence.

251869.「つまり 君は もう 支配されない！: That means she can't control you anymore!

251870.「おめでとう アスバル！\n これからは 親子 仲むつまじく\n 幸せな日々を:
Congratulations, Asbal! Now you two can live
happily ever after as mother and son...

251871.「……あの魔物を ひとめ見て わかった。\n 叔父の言葉は 真実なのだと。:
...One look at that monster and I knew. I knew
that my uncle's words were true.

251872.「だが……あいつは\n ひとつだけ 嘘をついている。: But... there's one thing he's lying about.

251874.「かつて 母エルガドーラは\n 身につけた者の意思をあやつる\n 魔法の首輪で:
Once, my mother Elgadora controlled me with a
magical collar that bound the will of the
wearer.

251875.「あれに 使われていたのと\n 同じ宝石が 水槽の中の 母上にも……。:
The same gemstones that were used to make that
thing are also on the tank containing my
mother...

251876.「今の母に 知能がないなんて 嘘だ。\n でなければ あの宝石を使う必要がない。:
It's a lie that my mother is not intelligent
now. Otherwise, he wouldn't have to use those
gems.

251877.「……君たちに頼んだ タリスマンがあれば\n オジャロスの 支配の術を 打ち消せ:
With the talisman I've asked you to give me,
I can break Ojalos' spell of control. I can
free my mother!

251878.「……今でも 母のことは 許せないさ。\n だが いくらなんでも\n オジャロス:
I still don't forgive my mother. But what
Ojalos has done to her is too much... too
horrible.

251879.「……オジャロスは 自分が 王位につく瞬間を\n 痛ましい姿になった母……エルガ:
Ojalos said he was going to show mother...
Elgadora, in her pitiful state, to the people
the moment he ascends the throne.

251880.「もっとも オジャロスが油断する瞬間……\n 王位譲渡の儀式に集まった民の前で\:
But once Ojalos lets his guard down... I
intend to save mother by exposing his crimes
in front of everyone during the ceremony.

251881.「リンベリィに協力をあおぎ 王位交代の宣誓に\n 潜入してくれ。そして 僕が 合:
I need you to enlist Linberry's help in
infiltrating the ceremony. Tell her to make a
distraction when I give her a signal.

251884.「さきの大戦で 勝利をもたらすどころか\n みなに 痛手を与えてしまったことは\:
It is my fault that in the last war, instead
of bringing victory, I have inflicted pain on
all of you!

251885.「……私 魔王アスバルは\n 偉大なるゼクレスの王には ふさわしくない。:
I, Demon King Asbal, am not fit to be king of
the great Zechres.

251886.「よって 今日 この日。\n もっとも ゼクレスの玉座に\n ふさわしき者に 王:
Therefore, on this day, I shall relinquish the
throne to the one most worthy of ruling
Zechres!

251888.「おやおや 魔瘴の巫女どのも\n この良き日に 駆けつけてくださるとは。\n ま:
Well, well... I didn't realize that the Maiden
of Miasma would also be attending this most
auspicious occasion. I am truly honored.

251890.「リンベリィの幻術で 他の者には\n 僕たちの会話は 聞こえていません……。\n:
Linberry's illusion will make it so that no
one else can hear our conversation, so let us
cut to the chase.

251891.「母に かけた術を 解いてください！: Undo what you did to my mother!

251892.「その宝石で 母の意識を 支配し\n 醜い魔物の肉体に 封じていることは\n わ:
I know that gemstone controls my mother's
consciousness and seals her in the body of an
ugly monster.

251893.「……あなたには 恩もある。\n 今すぐ 母を元に戻し この国から退くならば\n:
...I still feel indebted to you. If you
restore my mother now and leave this country
forever, I will show you leniency.

251894.「母上と あなたは あんなにも\n 仲が良い姉弟だったでは ありませんか！:
You and mother used to be very close as
siblings!

251895.「お願いです オジャロス叔父上！\n 母を……\n エルガドーラを 元に 戻して:
Please, Uncle Ojalos! Please restore my
mother... turn Elgadora back to normal!

251896.「やれやれ……。\n 何を 言い出すかと思えば 困ったねえ。:
Good grief... such troublesome things you're
saying.

251897.「姉上はもう 元の姿には 戻らない。\n ……残念ながら これは 真実なんだ。\:
My sister will never be back to normal... I'm
afraid that much is true, Asbal.

251898.「姉上は 幼い頃から 美しかった……。\n 姉とは似ても似つかぬ 私は\n じつ:
My sister was beautiful from an early age...
and I, who was nothing like her, was mocked
and ridiculed by our parents.

251899.「あの 誇り高き姉上に\n ご自慢の美貌も 魔力も失った\n 今の ご自分の姿は:
My prideful sister probably couldn't even bear
to look at herself now that she's lost both
her beauty and her magic...

251900.「だからこそ 私は 術を かけたのだよ。\n 姉上が 何も考えず 生きていけるよ:
That's why I mesmerized her. So that she can
continue to live without ever having to think
about it.

251901.「姉上の知能を 獣同然に\n 封じているのは むしろ 私の 優しささ。:
It was an act of kindness to seal my sister's
mind and reduce her to a mere beast.

251903.「叔父上！\n もう 母をもてあそぶのは やめてください！\n でなければ 僕に:
Uncle! Please stop toying with my mother! If
you refuse, then you'll leave me with no other
choice!

251905.「アスバル！ 集まったみんなに\n コイツの正体を ブチまけてやりなさいっ！:
Asbal! Tell everyone here who this cretin
really is!

251907.「ここにいる オジャロスは\n 卑劣な企みで 母エルガドーラを 陥れ\n 国に背:
Ojalos is a traitor who, in a wicked plot
against my mother Elgadora, has attempted to
overthrow this country!

251908.「ゼクレス魔導国が 魔王の名において\n オジャロスの爵位を 剥奪！\n 永久に:
In the name of the Demon King of Zechres, I
hereby strip Ojalos of his title and office!
You are banished from this country forever!

251910.「魔界でも 屈指の魔力を誇る お前に……\n 私が なんの備えも していないとで:
Did you really think I would come unprepared
to deal with the most powerful magic-user in
the Demon World?

251912.「さすがは 魔瘴の巫女どの……。\n まこと すさまじきチカラだ。:
As expected of the Maiden of Miasma, your
power is truly formidable.

251914.「おお かわいそうな アスバル！\n 聞き分けがないばっかりに\n 死ななければ:
Oh, poor Asbal! To have to die for being so
unreasonable...

251915.「お前が死んだら 姉上と 同じ姿にして\n かわいがってやろう！\n ほおーれ:
Once you're dead, I'll make you match your
mother and keep you both as pets! Come at me
then, if you dare!

251916.「……そんなことは させるものか！\n <cs_pchero>も チカラを貸して:
...You'll never get that chance! Please, lend
me your strength, <cs_pchero>! Ojalos! We
will defeat you here and now!

251917.「母上……！ すぐに お助けします！: Mother...! I'll help you right away!

251918.アスバルは 魔物になったエルガドーラに\nリドのタリスマンを 使った！:
Asbal used Lido's Talisman on the monstrous
Elgadora!

251921.「ばかめ……。すべては 手遅れだ！: You fool... it's all for naught!

251922.「姉上の肉体を 再生するときに\n ちょっとした 仕掛けを しておいたのさ。:
I mixed in a little something extra when I
revived my sister.

251923.「その女の身体は すでに 爆弾と化した！\n 自らの愛した国も 城も みな\n:
I made her body into a living bomb! Her
beloved country, her castle, all of it will be
reduced to ashes by her own power!

251925.「アスバル。お前の魔力なら\n あるいは 解呪できるかもしれんが……\n さあて:
Asbal... With your magic, you might be able to
break that enchantment... but do you really
have enough time to do so?

251926.「ああ。もうひとつ 方法はあったなあ……。\n 愛しい母上を殺せば ゼクレスを守:
Ah, there is another way, though... if you
kill your dear mother, you can save Zechres.

251927.「王として 母を殺すか！\n 息子として 国を道連れに 滅び去るか！\n お前の:
Will you kill your own mother as a king? Or
will you die along with your country as a son?
You must decide your fate!!

251930.「今から あなたの肉体を 爆弾に変えた術を\n 僕が 解呪します……。\n 必ず:
I'll break the spell that turned you into a
bomb... I promise I will save you, so don't
worry...

251933.「高貴なる ゼクレス王家の血を引きながら\n 大魔王にもなれず オジャロスごとき:
You pathetic excuse for a Demon King, allowing
yourself to be manipulated by someone like
Ojalos, despite being of royal blood!

251935.「アスバル！\n お前など 産むのではなかったわ！: Asbal! I should never have given birth to you!

251936.「こ……こんな時まで\n あなたは 憎まれグチを……っ！:
...Even now, you still spout such hateful
words...!

251937.「はーっはっは！ 母親が 憎いだろう！？\n さあ 怒りのままに\n その女を:
Haahaha! You despise your mother, don't you!?
Now, unleash that anger on that woman, and
crush her to pieces!!

251939.<center>それでいい……: This is how it must be...

251940.<center>ゼクレスを 頼んだぞ\n我が息子……\nいや 魔王アスバルよ……:
Take care of Zechres for me, my son... no,
Demon King Asbal...

251942.「……あなたは 王として生きることを\n 初めて 自分の意志で 選んだのね。:
...You have chosen for the first time to act
as a king of your own will.

251943.「ほら……。\n あなたの民が 王を 待っているわ。:
Look... your people are waiting for their
king.

251945.「王位を奪わんと 策謀をめぐらした\n 大逆人オジャロスは この 魔王自身の手で:
Ojalos, the traitor who plotted to seize the
throne, has been put to death by the Demon
King himself, so you can rest assured!

251946.「これまで 私の ふがいなさゆえに\n みなに 苦労をさせてしまった。\n ……:
I have caused you all hardship because of my
inadequacies... as the king of Zechres, I
sincerely apologize.

251947.「私は ここに 誓う！: I swear to you, here and now!

251948.「亡き母 エルガドーラが愛した\n この ゼクレスを……\n 我が生涯をかけて:
I will dedicate my life to protecting and
guiding Zechres... the country that my late
mother Elgadora loved so much!

251949.「……僕の母は\n 炎のように 激しく 美しい人だった。:
...My mother was beautiful, like a fiercely
burning flame.

251950.「母は 誇り高い人だ。あんな姿になったとは\n 誰にも 知られたくないだろう……:
Mother was very prideful. I don't think she would want anyone to know that she ended up like that... so please keep the identity of
that creature a secret.

251952.「ゼクレスのために 母が おこなったことの\n すべてが 正しかったとは思えない:
I don't think everything my mother did for
Zechres was right, but...

251953.「それでも……僕や 叔父よりも\n あの人は ずっと\n この国のことを 愛して:
Still... I think she loved this country more
than me or my uncle did.

251954.「僕が アストルティアに憧れたのは\n 母のいない世界で 暮らしたい……\n そ:
My yearning for Astoltia was based on a desire
to live in a world without my mother... a
desire to escape.

251955.「死んだ父さんが 赤ん坊だった僕を\n 連れていこうとしたという\n 自由の地:
Astoltia, a land of freedom, where my late
father tried to take me as a baby...

251956.「アストルティアでなら 何もかも 上手くいく。\n きっと幸せになれるんだと 信:
I believed that everything would be fine in
Astoltia. I believed that I would be happy.

251957.「もし きちんと 母と向き合っていれば。\n 叔父の うわべだけの優しさを 疑っ:
If only I had faced my mother properly. If
only I had seen through my uncle's twisted
"kindness", then maybe my mother would be...

251959.「ゼクレス魔導国の 魔王として\n 僕は この国で 生きていく。\n ……かつて:
As Demon King of Zechres, I will live in this
country... in the precious homeland that my
mother once loved.

251960.「二度と ゼクレスの民の血は 流させない。\n そのためには 魔界全体が\n 平:
Never again will the blood of Zechres' people
be spilled. For that to happen, the entire
Demon World must be at peace.

251961.「バルディスタや ファラザードとも\n かなうなら 和平を結びたい。\n ……君:
I would like to make peace with Valdista and
Farazard if possible. And I'm asking for your
cooperation.

251962.「アスバル……。\n あなたの決心 すごく 立派だと思うわ。:
Asbal... I think your decision is very
admirable.

251963.「君たちには 本当に 世話になったね。\n ゼクレス魔導国の 魔王として\n 礼:
I am truly indebted to you all. As the Demon
King of Zechres, I would like to thank you.

251964.「それじゃ また会おう。\n これからのゼクレスは 開かれた国にしていく。\n:
Then I will see you again. From now on,
Zechres will be an open country. Stop by
anytime.

251965.「……そうそう ベラストル家のリンベリィ。\n 君にも 礼を言わなくてはならなか:
...Oh yes, Linberry of House Belastre. I
must thank you as well. You have my utmost
gratitude. Be seeing you.

251967.「シリルなんて 偽名を使って 私に近づいて！\n さんざん コキ使ったあげくに\:
He used a fake name like Cyril just to get
close to me, and after all this time, THAT'S
his attitude towards me!?

251970.「……なるほどね。私に恋していると\n みんなの前で 認められないから\n あん:
...Oh, I see. What you're trying to say is
that he's playing hard-to-get because he can't
confess his love in front of everyone.

251971.「見てなさい！ こうなったら\n 絶対に アスバルを 私の魅力で\n メロメロに:
Just wait and see! I'll definitely make
Asbal's heart melt with my charm, and bring
him to his knees!

252363.「今の この国で 信頼できるのは\n 君たちしかいないんだ。\n ……どうか 頼:
You are the only people I can trust in this
country right now... please, I'm counting on
you.

255011.「アスバルからの熱い視線は 感じていたわ。: I could feel the intensity of Asbal's gaze.

257316.「だが……奥の手は これからだよ！: But... I still have some tricks up my sleeve!

258629.「さきほど 退位すると 宣言したのは\n 反逆者を油断させるための 罠である！:
My declaration earlier that I would abdicate
the throne was a trap to catch the traitor off
guard!

258630.ゼクレス魔導国の問題を 解決できたので\n次は バルディスタ要塞へ 向かおう。:
Now that we have solved the problem in
Zechres, let's move on to Fortress Valdista.

258631.ゼクレス魔導国と バルディスタ要塞\n双方の問題を 解決できたので\nゴダ神殿に:
Now that we have solved the problems of both
Zechres and Fortress Valdista, let's go and
report to the Oracle in Goda Temple!

261033.<center>はてなき空 はてなき時 めぐりめぐる千の星\nひとつの花 ひとつ:
Endless sky, endless time, a thousand stars
spinning around, one flower, one voice, a
thousand lives fill the earth.

261034.<center>うつろう空 過ぎゆく時\n花が枯れ 星が消え去ろうとも……:
Even if the sky wanes, the flowers wither, and
the stars fade away...
